Description
AcceptanceStatus
Holds the information weather a requested reviewer has accepted or rejected the request or has yet to decide.
AdministrationBacking
Backing bean for the administration page.
AvatarUtil
Provides functionality to generate a small thumbnail to be used in user avatars and the applications logo.

ConfigNotReadableException
Fires when the config file of the application can definitively not be read.
ConfigReader
 
Configuration
 
ConnectionPool
Holds a set of open database connections that can be used by the program.
ConnectionState
Encapsulates information about the state of the database connection.
CustomizationService
Provides functionality for the customization of the applications look and feel and for database information.
DataNotCompleteException
Is thrown when the reading of data yields an incomplete result but a retry has a high probability of succeeding, for example when a DataTruncation warning occurs.
DataNotWrittenException
Is thrown when the writing of data fails but a retry has a high probability of succeeding, for example when a DataTruncationException occurs.
DatasourceConfigurationException
Is thrown when bad configuration of the datasource leads to a failure to fetch data.
DatasourceNotFoundException
Is thrown when the datasource cannot be found.
DatasourceQueryFailedException
Is thrown when a query to the datasource fails and will probably fail again.
DateSelect
The options on a date filter on data tables.

EmailAddressLayoutValidator
 
EmailAddressUnoccupiedValidator
 
EmailSender
 
EmailServiceFailedException
Fires when the email service used by the application fails unrecoverably.
EmailTransmissionFailedException
Fires whenever the transmission of an email (to a specific list of senders) fails but the email service of this system is intact.
EmailUtil
Provides functionality for sending emails.
ErrorMessage
 
ErrorPageBacking
Backing bean for the error page.

Encapsulates a file that is passed between the layers.

IllegalAccessException
Is thrown when a user tries to access a page he is not entitled to visit.
IllegalUserFlowException

JSFConfiguration
Enables JSF 2.3/3.0 specific features.
KeyExistsException
Is thrown when the repository tries to save data with a unique value that already exists in the data.
Lifetime
Handles the system's start and shutdown.
LifeTimeListener
 
LoginService

MessageCategory

Backing bean for the result list.
ResultListFilter
A filter that can be applied on a column of a table.
ResultListFilterComparator
The four comparators equal to, less than or equal, greater than or equal and like.
ResultListFilterOption
A single comparison that can be used to construct a ResultListFilter.
ResultListParameters
Encapsulates all values a repository needs to configure the result lists on queries with a list of results.
Review
Represents a review.
ReviewedBy
Stores information about the review-request relationship of a submission and a user (the reviewer).
ReviewedByRepository
Offers get/change operations on the relationship between reviewer and submission.
ReviewRepository
Offers get/add/change/remove operations on a review and the possibility to get lists of reviews.
ReviewService
Provides functionality for dealing with reviews of submission papers.
ScienceField
Represents a field of science.
ScienceFieldRepository
Offers get/add/remove operations on a science field and the possibility to get lists of science fields.
ScienceFieldService
Provides functionality for handling the scientific fields (ScienceFields), that the application has.
